Package doerfer

Class AdvancedTilePlaced

java.lang.Object
doerfer.preset.Tile
doerfer.AdvancedTile
doerfer.AdvancedTilePlaced
public class AdvancedTilePlaced extends AdvancedTile
Class AdvancedTilePlaced This class is used only for placed tiles, so that the coordinates, the placing player and the rotation are known. Extends and uses the AdvancedTile, which doesn't have position or playerID
Author:
Jannis Fischer

  • Constructor Details

    • AdvancedTilePlaced

      public AdvancedTilePlaced(AdvancedTile aT, doerfer.preset.TilePlacement tP, int ID)
      Constructor of a placed Tile. To create the list of biomes the Advanced Tile at is used. From that, the biome - list is extracted.
      Parameters:
      aT - The original advancedTile, which should be placed nor
      tP - The tilePlacement, where the tile sits and which rotation is has
      ID - the player who sets the advancedTile

    • createVisualTile

      public AdvancedDrawableTile createVisualTile(doerfer.preset.graphics.GPanel p) throws IOException
      Returns an AdvancedDrawableTile with center and edges of the current tile. All six edges and the center are added to a new DrawableTile Also it sets a stroke in a specific color depending on the player who placed the tile
      Overrides:
      createVisualTile in class AdvancedTile
      Parameters:
      p - GPanel which is used
      Returns:
      DrawableTile
      Throws:
      IOException - from addChild

    • countEdge

      public void countEdge(int direction)
      Saves, if a biome in a specific direction has already been counted
      Parameters:
